10.ara-name: كتاب الجنائز عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Ibn Abbas narrated that:The Messenger of Allah said: "Wear the white among your garments, for indeed they are among the best of your garments, and shroud your dead in them

chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About What Is Recommended For Shrouding
